node.title: The self defence question at the centre of the Rittenhouse verdict
node.alt: Kyle Rittenhouse speaks to the camera.
node.description: Kyle Rittenhouse has been found not guilty of homicide after shooting dead two men and injuring a third at a Black Lives Matter protest. The question at the centre of his trial: Was it self defence?
node.content:
["Kyle Rittenhouse is standing on a street in Kenosha, Wisconsin,\u00a0with\u00a0an assault rifle strapped to his chest.", "\"Our job is to protect this business,\" the teenager says to a journalist, gesturing to a car dealership behind him.", "\"And part of my job is to help. If there's somebody hurt, I'm running into harm's way.", "\"That's why I have my rifle.\"", "The\u00a017-year-old isn't a soldier or a police officer.\u00a0He's a lifeguard at a nearby swimming pool.", "But he's\u00a0just minutes away from using the gun to kill\u00a0two men and seriously\u00a0injure a third.", "WARNING: This story contains graphic images and video", "", "
Kyle Rittenhouse's case has sparked debate over vigilantism\u00a0and self-defence\u00a0in the US.(The Journal Times via AP: Adam Rogan)
", "Mr Rittenhouse has come to the streets of Kenosha\u00a0on the third night of Black Lives Matter protests prompted by a police officer shooting and critically injuring\u00a0black man Jacob Blake.", "Mr Rittenhouse says he's there to protect property, put out fires and offer medical aid to anyone hurt in the protests, but he's violating a curfew order by being on the streets, as are scores of other people on both sides of a deep political divide.", "To some Americans,\u00a0he is a reckless\u00a0vigilante\u00a0aligned with racist groups and\u00a0looking for a fight in a town brimming with social and racial tension.", "But to others, he is an upstanding citizen who's come to protect businesses from protesters.", "The split between Americans on the issue has reverberated in media around the world \u2014 but the jury that has just acquitted\u00a0him\u00a0was only asked to answer one question.", "Was it justified when he raised his rifle and shot three people?", "
Chaos in Kenosha
", "In the US, the summer of 2020 was marked by sustained protests over the deaths of black Americans at the hands of police.", "While the murder of George Floyd by police officer Derek Chauvin was the flashpoint, his wasn't the only case that sparked fury over perceived racial injustice.", "The names Breonna Taylor, Ahmaud Arbery, and Kenosha's Jacob Blake were also on the lips of demonstrators.", "", "
There was unrest in Kenosha after the shooting of black man Jacob Blake by police.(AP: Morry Gash)
", "While most Black Lives Matter\u00a0protests around the US were peaceful \u2014 93 per cent according to one widely cited study \u2014 protesters' anger and the perceived heavy-handedness of police crowd control sometimes resulted in outbursts of destruction and violence.", "In Kenosha, cars and buildings were set alight by rioters in the wake of Mr Blake's shooting, and far-right groups put out a call for armed people\u00a0to break the curfew and\u00a0take to the streets.", "\"Any patriots willing to take up arms and defend our city tonight from the evil thugs?\" one self-described militia\u00a0wrote.", "", "
Groups of armed men descended on the protests in Kenosha.(AP: Morry Gash)
", "It was in that context that Mr Rittenhouse, who had expressed support for right-wing causes,\u00a0police and the Black Lives Matter counter-campaign \"Blue Lives Matter\"\u00a0decided to drive 30 minutes from his home in the state of Illinois, to\u00a0go out in Kenosha on the night of August 25, 2020.", "The 17-year-old\u00a0said he brought an AR-15-style assault rifle \"to protect myself\".\u00a0A\u00a0friend had purchased it\u00a0because\u00a0he was too young to legally buy\u00a0a gun.", "
'No space to run to'
", "As the evening deepened, a group of heavily armed civilians\u00a0came into contact with the protesters.", "Among the crowd was Joseph\u00a0Rosenbaum, who had just been released from hospital for mental health treatment.", "", "
Joseph Rosenbaum, one of the men\u00a0Kyle Rittenhouse shot,\u00a0was earlier filmed taunting armed men.(Twitter: @Julio_Rosas11)
", "Mr Rosenbaum's behaviour was captured in video of the scene, with him allegedly setting a bin on fire before being filmed goading armed men.", "\"Shoot me,\" he taunts.", "However, prosecutors and witnesses said he was not a threat, and instead characterised\u00a0him as a \"babbling idiot\" and \"not a serious danger\".", "Infrared video taken by an FBI plane monitoring the protests a short time later shows Mr Rosenbaum, who appears as little more than a white dot, running down the street towards a car yard with Mr Rittenhouse behind him.", "", "
Infrared footage showed the moment\u00a0Kyle Rittenhouse encountered\u00a0Joseph Rosenbaum.(Supplied: FBI via AP)
", "Then their paths crossed.", "\"We don't know exactly what was going on, we don't know what words were said,\" prosecutor Thomas Binger told the jury, arguing Mr\u00a0Rittenhouse had started the confrontation.", "Mr Rittenhouse testified he \"didn't notice Mr Rosenbaum until he came out from behind the car and ambushed me\".", "Bystander video shot from a distance captured\u00a0what happened next.", "Mr Rosenbaum begins chasing Mr Rittenhouse.\u00a0As he does so, a bystander fires a pistol into the air for unknown reasons.", "It's\u00a0something the pair hear but do not see.", "", "
Kyle Rittenhouse testified Mr Rosenbaum was as far away as the judge, just before the shooting.(AP pool: Mark Hertzberg\u00a0)
", "\"As I'm turning around, Mr\u00a0Rosenbaum\u00a0is, I would say, from me to where the judge is, coming at me with his arms out in front of him,\" Mr Rittenhouse said in sometimes tearful testimony.", "\"I remember his hand on the barrel of my gun.", "\"There was no space for me to continue to run to.\"", "Mr Rittenhouse\u00a0shoots him four times.", "At the trial, prosecutors stressed the fatal round was a shot to the back, fired as Mr Rosenbaum fell forward\u00a0onto the ground.", "
The chase
", "Bystanders reacted swiftly to the gunshots, and a small group carried a fatally injured Mr Rosenbaum to a hospital\u00a0that happened to be located across the street.", "But Rittenhouse did not hang around to help.", "\"I just shot somebody,\" he says in a call to a\u00a0friend.", "Video captures the crowd beginning to yell for somebody to stop him as he rushes\u00a0away.", "Mr Rittenhouse begins running back towards a line set up by police about three blocks away but some of the crowd, believing he is an \"active shooter\", follow.\u00a0", "", "
The shootings took place during the third night unrest in Kenosha, Wisconsin.
", "Those\u00a0behind him include\u00a0protester Anthony Huber and self-described medic Gaige Grosskreutz \u2014 each of whom he shoots\u00a0in a matter of seconds.", "As Mr Rittenhouse runs towards the police line he trips, and an unknown member of the crowd kicks him in the head while he is on the ground.", "Mr Rittenhouse fires his gun but misses, just before Mr Huber, an avid skater, attempts to hit him with his skateboard.", "", "
Anthony Huber was shot by Kyle Rittenhouse after hitting him with a skateboard.(Supplied: Go Fund Me)
", "As the two scuffle, the teenager fatally shoots Mr Huber in the chest.\u00a0At the same moment,\u00a0Mr Grosskreutz\u00a0runs up,\u00a0drawing a handgun.", "After a momentary pause where Mr Grosskreutz raises his hands, he\u00a0moves forward. He later admitted under cross-examination that his movement meant he was pointing the gun at Mr Rittenhouse, though he said he did not intend to shoot.", "He is\u00a0shot in the arm by Mr Rittenhouse, who gets up and runs to police lines with his hands up.", "", "
The court heard Gaige Grosskreutz was pointing a gun at the moment he was shot by Kyle Rittenhouse.(AP pool: Mark Hertzberg)
", "Despite approaching a police car, the teenager is not arrested.", "They tell him\u00a0to go home, apparently\u00a0unaware of the two dead men a short distance down the street.", "
'Domestic terrorist' or patriot?
", "Mr Rittenhouse handed himself to police in Illinois a short time later, but a political divide was already\u00a0forming over whether he was an aggressor or someone who had used his second amendment rights to arm to defend himself.", "Then-president Donald Trump came out in support of the teenager, who had reportedly sat in the front row of one of his rallies earlier that year.", "", "
Donald Trump visited Kenosha the week after the shooting. He\u00a0had already defended Kyle Rittenhouse.(AP: Evan Vucci)
", "\"He was trying to get away from them I guess, it looks like,\" Mr Trump said a week after the shooting.", "\"He fell and they violently attacked him \u2026\u00a0he probably would have been killed.\"", "As conservative groups raised money for his bail, his family began selling \"Free Kyle\" merchandise, before being quickly kicked off an online vendor.", "Other segments of a polarised America painted him as an armed vigilante whose presence inflamed the protests.", "Gun safety advocates like Ryan Busse, a former gun industry executive, said he feared Mr Rittenhouse would become \"some heroic martyr\" who made it \"glamorous to go kill somebody with a rifle\".", "", "
Kyle Rittenhouse was grilled about his motivations on the night of the shooting.(AP pool: Mark Hertzberg\u00a0)
", "Democratic congresswoman Ayanna Pressley went so far as to call the teenager a \"domestic terrorist\".", "The promotion of Mr\u00a0Rittenhouse by\u00a0conservative and far-right circles seeped into the courtroom as preparations for his trial began \u2014 but not all of it was presented to the jury.", "Once out on bail, he had been photographed posing with members of the far-right organisation Proud Boys, which has been labelled a hate group by the Southern Poverty Law Centre, and making a hand gesture that has been linked to white power hate speech.", "He was wearing a shirt emblazoned with the phrase \"free as f***\".", "He also met with the group's national president in Miami.", "The court changed his bail conditions to explicitly forbid him from associating with white supremacists, however,\u00a0it ultimately ruled the jury could not be presented with evidence of his meetings with the group.", "Another blow for prosecutors came\u00a0when Judge Bruce Schroeder ordered that lawyers in the trial not to refer to the two dead men and Mr Grosskreutz as \"victims\".", "Prosecutors also abandoned an attempt to portray Mr Huber as a \"hero\" for attempting to intercept Mr Rittenhouse.", "But the court ruled\u00a0it was open to defence lawyers to portray the three as looters, arsonists or rioters if they could prove it.", "Left-wing misgivings about Judge Schroeder were only amplified when his phone rang during the trial.", "His ringtone was God Bless the USA by Lee Greenwood \u2014 the same tune Mr Trump had entered the stage to at scores of rallies as president.", "
The trial
", "The question at the centre of the trial was not whether it was a good idea for Mr Rittenhouse to have gone to Kenosha. Nor did the trial examine in detail the political circus surrounding his actions.", "The question before the jury was\u00a0whether a reasonable person would have felt a threat to their life that warranted firing a gun as Mr Rittenhouse did, if faced with the same circumstances.", "", "
Kyle Rittenhouse broke down at one point during his testimony.(AP pool: Mark Hertzberg)
", "Prosecutors, who described Mr Rittenhouse as a \"chaos tourist\", told the jury that despite hundreds of clashes between people of radically different views that night, only two were fatal, and both involved the teenager.", "\"You lose the right to self-defence when you're the one who brought the gun, when you are the one creating the danger, when you're the one provoking other people.\"", "But the defence argued that was simply because Mr Rittenhouse was the only one attacked in the way he claimed to have been.", "They stressed that each time he fired, he was in close proximity to someone he perceived as a threat.\u00a0", "Courtroom testimony at times seemed to favour the teenager's claims of self-defence, with prosecution witnesses like Mr Grosskreutz acknowledging his gun was pointed at the teenager when he was hit by a bullet.", "", "
Gaige Grosskreutz acknowledged his gun was pointing in\u00a0Kyle Rittenhouse's direction when he was shot.(AP Pool: Mark Hertzberg)
", "But it was the\u00a0prosecution questioning of Mr Rittenhouse\u00a0that brought the case close to being thrown out, when Mr Binger asked whether it was appropriate to use deadly force to protect property.", "He had been hoping to contrast Mr Rittenhouse's answer with a video\u00a0showing the teenager saying he wished he could shoot shoplifters two weeks before the Kenosha protest.", "Judge Schroeder had indicated he would not want to have the jury shown the tape unless the evidence of the trial changed his mind.", "The prosecutor's conduct prompted the judge to harshly admonish him\u00a0as the defence called for a mistrial \u2014 the first of two attempts they made.", "Despite the political context the trial sat in, Judge Schroeder impressed upon the jury their responsibility not to be swayed.", "Their verdict was not guilty on all counts.", "
'Two sets of laws'
", "Protests continued in Kenosha after Mr Rittenhouse killed Mr Huber and Mr Rosenbaum.", "But some became particularly frustrated with the perceived divide in treatment of Black Lives Matter protesters and armed men like Mr Rittenhouse.\u00a0", "", "
Family members of Jacob Blake continued to lead marches after the Kenosha shooting.(Scott Olson/Getty Images)
", "A class-action lawsuit filed in the Eastern District Court of Wisconsin alleged there were \"two sets of laws\" for those who broke the curfew during the Kenosha protests.", "According to the claim filed by Black Lives Matter activists, more than 150 peaceful protesters were arrested for breaching the curfew during the Kenosha protests.\u00a0", "None of them were from the often-armed\u00a0pro-police groups, among whom Mr Rittenhouse associated.", "The 150 arrests\u00a0contrasted sharply with video showing police giving water to Mr Rittenhouse's group before the shooting and saying: \"We appreciate you guys, we really do.\"", "It is a divide they said meant Black Lives Matter protesters would never have been able to do what Mr Rittenhouse did that night,\u00a0then simply be told:\u00a0\"Go home.\"", "ABC/wires"]
